name: To Last- Next Chapter
description:
Welcome to the adventure of "To Last"!

This game is about whether to last or not to last, you wake up on a deserted island and try to find a way to get to civilization, with no memory of what has happened. Follow the path to find the answer, but look out for whoever might be keeping you from getting answers. 

"To Last - Next Chapter" is the second part of a full game that is in development, the first chapter of the game will be released on this page as well. The full game consists of 3 chapters that will be combined as part of separate school projects.
